Text: <c.white><c.mono_sans>I was just going to say the same</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>never in my life seen men fight</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>We captured two of them who were</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>Is it your will that I am here</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>He must be a man of ambition</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>We are all aware of the sacred</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>It's easy to imagine why a man</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>like this would do such a thing.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>This is a man who does not</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>This is a man who does not</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I stabbed him in the heart when</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>he tried his best to rape me.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
